title: Oliver Smith Jeweler Website
description: An e-commerce platform for Oliver Smith Jeweler, featuring a custom Shopify theme. The site includes a product catalog. Built with Shopify Liquid, HTML/CSS, and JavaScript, it offers a seamless shopping experience across devices.

title: WatchWeek Website
description: WatchWeekAspen is a sleek, user-friendly platform built on Squarespace that brings the excitement of Watch Week Aspen right to your fingertips. Designed to showcase all curated events happening throughout the week, the site allows visitors to effortlessly browse event details and RSVP. Whether you're on desktop or mobile, the responsive interface ensures a seamless experience as you plan your participation in exclusive watch-related gatherings.

title: Weekly Hour App
description: A web application designed for employees to track their weekly hours. This app features a user-friendly interface for logging hours, generating reports, and integrating with payroll systems. Built with React, NeonDB, Oauth, it ensures secure data handling and real-time updates.
